item.title: Amma endrazhaikadha uyirillaye: Lyrics and Translation
item.description: This is a beautiful song which is for mothers from their grateful children. In the movie the character portrayed by Rajani Kanth is taking care of his old mother.

item.title: LOG 1.21: Musik und Ordnung
item.description: 29th June, 2011 Hello everyone ðŸ™‚ I just scored 93% on my first level German exam! Feeling great about it! I have found order (ordunung) in my life and everything is organised in lists and inserted in my Google calendar and on my Napkin-mousepad ðŸ™‚ the furniture in my room is rearranged and everything is clean and tidy.

item.title: LOG 1.22 Boats :)
item.description: 12th July, 2011 Hello, I hope all of you have been well. Life has improved significantly for me since I organised it. I now feel like I have a sense of purpose and

item.title: Unna Nenachen Pattu Padichen: Lyrics and translation
item.description: Here is another Kamal song sung by SPB. This is from the movie Aboorva Sagotharargal where Kamal acts as brothers. One who looks normal and another who is very short.

item.title: Engeyum Eppothum (Ninaithale Inikkum) Lyrics and Translation
item.description: Here is a song with both Rajani and Kamal Hassan with Jayaprada. It is from a movie called Ninaithale Inikkum. Also from the 80Â´s. Thanks to my dad for corrections with the translation.

item.title: Senthamizh Naatu Thamizhachiye: Lyrics and Translation
item.description: Here is a song from the movie Vandicholai Chinraasu. For the light comical tune it keeps, the last verse is incongruously preachy. It reflects the morals and values of the early 90s especially in smaller towns.
